title: Ep. 102 - Why This Rally Will Continue
itunes:title: Why This Rally Will Continue
description: Chris Mayer, editor of the Capital & Crisis newsletter, says stocks are going higher. Frank talks about his three favorite "game-changing" small-cap companies that could change the landscape of an entire industry.
